description: Gotta prepare for the big day.
/8/The End/8/ has /c/low air/c/. You'll need /c/a solution to replenish your air/c/ while in there.

Air doesn't drain too fast, giving you a few good minutes even without any gear. Wearing a /b/Diving Helmet/b/ will /6/give you even longer/6/, and wearing a filled /b/Copper Backtank/b/ allows you to draw air from it instead, /6/keeping you breathing until it runs out/6/.
You'll have to /6/sacrifice some armour/6/ for this, but the outer end islands are /6/fairly peaceful/6/. It's just you, the void, and some endermen.

/b/Water Breathing/b/ is an alternative solution, /c/although air will still be drawn from/c/ /b/Backtanks/b/ while it's in effect. Similarly, a /b/Conduit/b/ can be used as a /6/more permanent solution/6/ to breathing.

It's also /c/quite cold/c/ in the end. Bring a /b/heating solution/b/, or some /6/well-insulated/6/ armour. It's not /6/quite as cold/6/ as the nether is hot, so you'll have a /6/fair bit of time before freezing/6/.
/8/The End/8/ may be /6/quite tricky to traverse/6/. It'll have /6/less void/6/ than your used to, but some methods to /6/travel vertically/6/ may be neccesary.
